OOC: Condor Blasters, energon knives... things like that.
BTW howis the cell like inside?


COndor looked his cell, and how Areoblast removed his weapons... He 
was aparently camly but inside he was in the boiling point. "At last 
told me what will you do with me???" he said without fear.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> OOC: Astroblast's base is in Canada, down-right of Hudson's Bay 
> (the U shaped bay which is somewhat above the great lakes.)
> 
> Astroblast, while walking into the base, removes any weapons that 
> Condor may have visible and searches for any concealed weapons 
> that Condor may have. (in other words do you have any for me to 
> find?) "This is your cell," Astroblast says to Condor, as they 
arrive 
> at the cell, "I would not recomend touching the bars, they will 
drain 
> you of you energon. The hallway inner-defense security guns will 
> also gun you down if you get past the cell." Then to Triggerhappy, 
> "I'm going to return to the CF to make sur Menasor gets back in 
> one piece. Guard the base and the prisoner."
> 
> On 23 Feb 2001, at 5:36, airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > OOC: is Astroblast's base in USA?
> > 
> > Condor::
> > 
> > Condor heard the shot close to him, he guess that Triggerhappy 
liked 
> > to scare him, but he didn't give him that pleasure. When 
Astroblat 
> > grabbed his arm, Condor reluctant walked altought he would wish 
ran 
> > away but stay in a enemy base with several bot around him was 
enough 
> > reason to don't do it, it wasn't wise.
> > 
> > "I should wait a chance" tought COndor
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> > > "Lets put the bot into the energon holding cells (prison) till 
we 
> > > return." (Astroblast is quite strong so escaping him would be 
very 
> > > dificult). He grabs Condors arm, and takes him down to the 
holding 
> > > base.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > On 23 Feb 2001, at 0:47, airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > 
> > > > COndor::
> > > > 
> > > > The pain that he felt was big... He was lost now!!! He only 
could 
> > > > trust that his friends would help him now... He didn't move 
and 
> > > > didn't speak. He only had to wait a chance to run away or 
wait 
> > for 
> > > > help.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> > > > > ::Triggerhappy::
> > > > > 
> > > > >        Triggerhappy yanks Condor out with him from the 
hatch, 
> > then 
> > > > puts him
> > > > > on the ground.  Blowpipe turns back into Triggerhappy's 
> > compressed 
> > > > air
> > > > > cannon.  He kicks Condor in the side, and points Blowpipe 
at 
> > Condor.
> > > > > 
> > > > >         "You make one move, you die!" He said.
> > > > > 
> > > > >          Triggerhappy was getting eager to start firing his 
> > guns at 
> > > > the
> > > > > enemy.  Of course, the 'GRID' option was even dandier.
